scripts.fix-html: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let html=fs.readFileSync('dist/index.html','utf8'); html=html.replace('<script type=\"module\" crossorigin src=\"./index.js\"></script>','<script src=\"./index.js\"></script>'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.html',html); console.log('Fixed script tag in index.html');"
